ContactSection.title: Let's connect
ContactSection.paragraph: Whether you have a project you want to work on together or just want us to meet and have a chat, you are in the right place: let's get in touch. We are always looking for new and exciting projects and collaborations.

AboutSection.title: About
AboutSection.paragraph1: I'm a frontend developer with over 3 years of commercial experience, specializing in creating dynamic and responsive web applications. With a strong focus on Next.js and React, I build efficient, user-friendly interfaces that are optimized for speed and scalability. My proficiency in TypeScript allows me to write clean, maintainable code, ensuring that projects are efficient and free from runtime errors.
AboutSection.paragraph2: In addition to working with modern JavaScript frameworks, I have extensive experience with WordPress, which allows me to create custom websites and themes tailored to the client's needs. I'm passionate about creating intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences, always with the end user in mind. Throughout my career, I've worked on many projects, from small business sites to complex web applications, continually improving my skills and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.
AboutSection.paragraph3: As a developer, I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute to solving challenges and improving workflows. I enjoy learning new technologies and finding innovative ways to streamline web development processes, always striving for the best results for clients and users.

StackSection.title: Stack
StackSection.paragraph1: My knowledge and programming skills are based on the following technologies. As a developer, I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute to solving challenges and improving workflows.
StackSection.paragraph2: I am open to learning new technologies and implementing them in my projects. I believe that continuous improvement of skills is key to success in the IT industry. 1.title: WorkFlow Pro
1.description: A modern, fully responsive portfolio website designed to showcase projects using the latest technologies. The site integrates smooth animations, dynamic content loading, and an intuitive interface that seamlessly adapts to different screen sizes. The design system ensures a consistent aesthetic while maintaining optimal performance. The portfolio leverages advanced component rendering and state management techniques, resulting in lightning-fast loading times even for complex visual elements. The modular architecture allows easy functionality expansion in the future. A content management system implementation enables quick project updates without modifying the source code. The latest image and resource optimization practices lead to excellent performance scores in Google Lighthouse tests. The project employs advanced interface virtualization techniques, ensuring smooth performance even when displaying hundreds of elements. Client-side routing provides instant navigation between pages without the usual delays associated with full-page reloads. Advanced animations utilize GPU acceleration, reducing CPU load and ensuring smooth performance even on lower-powered devices. The implemented color theme system automatically adjusts to the user's light or dark theme preferences.

2.title: Team Members Plugin
2.description: An advanced 3D visualization platform utilizing Three.js and React to create immersive and interactive experiences. The application employs efficient rendering techniques and optimized animation sequences, ensuring smooth interactions even with complex 3D models. TypeScript implementation provides type safety and enhances code reliability. The project offers exploration of intricate visual environments, including advanced lighting effects, texturing, and object shading. The camera management system enables smooth transitions between different perspectives, while optimized computational algorithms guarantee high performance even on mobile devices. The platform introduces an innovative system for interacting with 3D objects, allowing real-time manipulation of parameters such as materials, textures, and lighting effects. A physics engine implementation allows realistic object behavior simulations, including gravity, collisions, and scene element interactions. The resource management system automatically optimizes model detail levels based on the camera distance and device performance. The application's architecture enables seamless integration with external data sources, facilitating real-time parameterized visualizations. The use of advanced post-processing techniques results in photorealistic visual effects, including depth of field, light reflections, and atmospheric effects. A vast library of pre-built 3D components accelerates the creation of complex scenes and enables rapid prototyping of new concepts.

3.title: Hubra.com.pl
3.description: A dynamic web application offering customizable dashboards and real-time data visualization, providing users with an interactive way to analyze and interpret complex datasets. The project combines advanced frontend frameworks with high-performance animation libraries, creating a smooth and engaging user experience. The implementation of advanced charts and diagrams allows instant understanding of trends and patterns in data. A filtering and sorting system enables quick adjustment of views to specific analytical needs. The application also supports data export in various formats and the creation of automated reports sent on a scheduled basis. A machine learning mechanism automatically detects data anomalies and suggests potential interpretations of identified patterns. The real-time alert system notifies users of significant changes in monitored metrics, allowing quick responses to emerging trends. Advanced predictive algorithms enable forecasting of future values based on historical data, considering seasonality and long-term trends. A permissions management mechanism allows precise control over access to individual dashboards and datasets based on user roles within an organization. The external data integration system allows for the aggregation and analysis of information from various business systems, databases, and cloud services. The application features an advanced SQL editor that enables power users to create custom queries with auto-suggestions and syntax validation.

4.title: DevHireNet
4.description: A high-performance e-commerce platform built with Vue, offering advanced filtering options and smooth product transitions. The application leverages responsive design using Tailwind CSS and GSAP animations to provide seamless user interactions. Nuxt.js integration enhances SEO capabilities through server-side rendering, optimizing platform visibility in search results. The shopping cart system retains its contents even after closing the browser, while the payment module integrates with popular payment gateways. The platform also features a product recommendation system based on browsing and purchase history, increasing conversion rates and order value. An advanced search system utilizes semantic analysis algorithms and machine learning, allowing product discovery even with imprecise queries or spelling errors. The product comparison feature enables users to compare up to five products simultaneously, with filtering options based on their preferences. The real-time inventory management system informs customers about product availability and estimated delivery times. The platform supports product customization through an interactive 3D configurator, allowing users to visualize changes in colors, materials, or add-ons before purchasing. A multi-tier loyalty program automatically awards points for purchases, product reviews, and referrals of new customers. The integrated return and complaint management module streamlines the post-purchase process, increasing customer trust in the platform.

5.title: pawelbilski.com
5.description: A feature-rich full-stack application that seamlessly integrates a Django backend with a modern frontend stack. This project showcases robust API development and responsive UI design, including RESTful endpoints, user authentication, real-time data visualization, and notification systems. The permissions management system allows precise access control based on user roles. An advanced caching system and optimized database queries ensure fast response times even under high loads. The application provides an extensive API for third-party developers and comprehensive documentation, facilitating functionality expansion by development teams. The microservices architecture allows independent scaling of application modules based on load, ensuring optimal performance and efficient resource utilization. A containerized Docker-based architecture simplifies deployment and environment management across development, testing, and production stages. The continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) system automates testing and version release processes, minimizing errors and reducing the time required to implement changes. A sophisticated monitoring and logging system enables performance tracking, bottleneck detection, and user behavior analysis. GraphQL implementation offers an alternative to REST API, allowing clients to specify precise data requirements, reducing transferred data volume, and improving application responsiveness. The error-handling and exception-management system ensures graceful degradation of functionality in case of component failures, maintaining critical application functions even in crisis scenarios.
